data.message: Do all your bottles come with the code on them?  We have some Coke Zero 2L bottles with the promotional label on them, but there doesn't appear to be a PIN under the lid.  There is a code (letter followed by 3 numbers) but this keeps showing an 'Oops' message when entered.  It is also engraved on to the black lid rather than written onto a white insert, which makes me think it isn't correct.  Any ideas?

replies.message: Hi Terri, we're sorry to hear this. Please could you PM us a picture of your promotional bottles, lids and the production info that can be found on the neck of the bottles, so that we can look into this for you. Thanks
